nwspol.description: News about politics and current affairs, watching, reading or listening, in minutes on a typical day
nwspol.question: On a typical day, about how much time do you spend watching, reading or listening to news about politics and current affairs?

netusoft.question: How often do you use the internet on these or any other devices, whether for work or personal use?

netustm.description: Internet use, how much time on typical day, in minutes
netustm.question: On a typical day, about how much time do you spend using the internet on a computer, tablet, smartphone or other device, whether for work or personal use?

ppltrst.description: Most people can be trusted or you can't be too careful
ppltrst.question: Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted, or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people?

pplfair.description: Most people try to take advantage of you, or try to be fair
pplfair.question: Do you think that most people would try to take advantage of you if they got the chance, or would they try to be fair?

values.0: Most people try to take advantage of me
values.10: Most people try to be fair

pplhlp.description: Most of the time people helpful or mostly looking out for themselves
pplhlp.question: Would you say that most of the time people try to be helpful or that they are mostly looking out for themselves?

values.0: People mostly look out for themselves
values.10: People mostly try to be helpful

polintr.question: How interested would you say you are in politics?

psppsgva.description: Political system allows people to have a say in what government does
psppsgva.question: How much would you say the political system in [country] allows people like you to have a say in what the government does?

actrolga.description: Able to take active role in political group
actrolga.question: How able do you think you are to take an active role in a group involved with political issues?

psppipla.description: Political system allows people to have influence on politics
psppipla.question: And how much would you say that the political system in [country] allows people like you to have an influence on politics?

cptppola.description: Confident in own ability to participate in politics
cptppola.question: And how confident are you in your own ability to participate in politics?

trstprl.question: How much do you personally trust the country's parliament?

trstlgl.question: How much do you personally trust the legal system?

trstplc.question: How much do you personally trust the police?

trstplt.question: How much do you personally trust politicians?

trstprt.question: How much do you personally trust political parties?

trstep.question: How much do you personally trust the European Parliament?

trstun.question: How much do you personally trust the United Nations?

trstsci.question: How much do you personally trust scientists?
